title: Resolution problem with streaming apps
content: Streaming apps like Hbo Max and Amazon Prime are having resolution problems the screen is cutting in out, you can't fill the screen. I tried using the 3 buttons navigation gesture and it work to see the UI but the screen is not filled.I have this problem with Google Pixel 4 XL and Pixel 5. I look online for a solution but there's a lot of people with the same issue and there's no fix yet. Please resolve asap. Thanks
